Summary: Observation of type 2 drops, and a cigar.
divs: Sighting DetailsI'm with my family was on the street. Also, the street was still about 10 people. The first object noticed my wife. The object looked like a drop of water, which pulsated and was flying very slowly. After that, he flew another object in forime drops of water, and then flying cigar-shaped object at high speed. It was not a meteor! All objects have a trajectory in the form of a graph - up and then down, as if leaping through the air.All people who were nearby, looking at these objects. Span objects proisodil during the period 10 minutes. The first two objects flew over the horizon. Sinara flew very quickly. I managed to take photographs of these objects. The cigar flew across its motion, and buckle into an arc. This is not the first observations of unidentified objects over our city of residence. In the Internet, there are many videos of UFO sightings over the city of Snezhinsk in Russia.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Snezhinsk
There were no other sightings in Snezhinsk on or around August 11th 2012
